data.text: @SaangtoAikaa I'm for it too, every soap couple goes through a cheating scandal, the fact these two have got to 3 years married and still haven't is absurd and not how soap couples work. Soaps are all about cheating, affairs and no couple should be treated differently excluding the challenge

@Bollyfan89 Gemma started filming December, the beach bts were only a few weeks ago so could be by then they are all friends, I really don't know. I want to see some hurt/jealousy from Chloe rather then erasing Chlic the way they erased Chelly😮‚Äç💨But any hurt could see Chloe turning to Leo🤔

@cutebabe79 If they have finally decided to wreck the most boring couple on Ramsay Street's marriage, I am all for it. 
For the past 3 years, David & Aaron have done nothing but stand behind their kitchen counter-top & gossip about their family & #Neighbours
